Comment: Can’t finish a pipeline to Canada, but we can open up exploration and development in Venezuela - which has super dirty oil that costs more to refine, as they need to get the sulfur and other shit out.    Fu__ing hell, Biden’s flunkies who actually ran the nation were absolute idiots.
Author: cliffotn

Comment: I've always found the argument that Trump is only serving the rich strange, since the tariffs are probably one of the most hostile actions against megacorporations he could've taken. They *despise* him for it, because their entire economic model revolves around paying their workers like slaves and selling it into the US.
Author: Scamandrius

Comment: They've always used "out of sight, out of mind" as their strategy to solve problems. They talk a big game about whatever hot bed topic they've used to rile up their base, then they export the solution we were already using here to another nation so that their constituents don't "see" it.
Author: Sangmund_Froid
